alert.note: Alert for Abbeville; Anderson; Greenwood; Laurens (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 20 at 3:23PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN LAURENS... SOUTHEASTERN ANDERSON...NORTHEASTERN ABBEVILLE AND NORTHWESTERN GREENWOOD COUNTIES THROUGH 400 PM EDT... At 323 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles north of Abbeville, or near Due West, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Laurens, Greenwood, Honea Path, Ware Shoals, Due West, Donalds, Cokesbury, Waterloo, Hodges, and Shoals Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
